author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
In this special episode, we take you through the nightmare obstacle course of growing up under the Chinese Communist Party:
🧠 Aborted before birth for being the wrong gender
🥛 Poisoned with melamine-laced formula
💉 Injected with toxic vaccines
🚼 Wrapped in recycled diapers and left to abusive nannies
🎒 And if you're really "lucky"? Molested and drugged in elite kindergartens, while CCP censors rush to bury the truth.

We break down everything—from the RYB Kindergarten scandal to China’s live organ harvesting system—and expose how the state treats children as tools, not lives.

This isn't dystopian fiction. This is the CCP’s version of childhood.
Subscribe for more hard-hitting truth they don’t want you to see.

📌 Watch till the end. It gets darker than you think.

#China #ChildrensDay #CCPExposed #RYBScandal #ChineseEducation #HumanRights #CommunismKills #Melamine #VaccineScandal

https://www.upholdjustice.org/node/647

https://youtu.be/BoLdeO2dP8c?si=ST6YSn8EHbo5cVXg
title: Made in the CCP: The Childhood Trauma Factory
